benchmark_details.name: FLEX-TRAVEL PLANNER
benchmark_details.overview: Flex-TravelPlanner evaluates language models' ability to reason flexibly in dynamic planning scenarios, introducing two evaluation settings: sequential constraint introduction and scenarios with prioritized competing constraints.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To assess the flexible reasoning abilities of language agents in dynamic, multi-turn planning scenarios.

data.source: Flex-TravelPlanner dataset constructed from TravelPlanner data.

methodology.calculation: Constraint Pass Rate is calculated as the ratio of passed constraints to total constraints across all plans.
methodology.interpretation: Higher Constraint Pass Rate indicates better planning performance under dynamic constraints.
methodology.validation: Evaluated models in zero-shot settings with structured references.
